name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Tate ORAM, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Tate ORAM, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Columbia County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Cleveland C. Hummel, Bloomsburg, for appellant.
Gailey C. Keller, Dist. Atty., Elwood R. Harding, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 743
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James Tate ORAM, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Cleveland C. Hummel, Bloomsburg, for appellant.
Gailey C. Keller, Dist. Atty., Elwood R. Harding, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
